quotes.message: Good company and good discourse are the very sinews of virtue.
quotes.name: Izaak Walton

quotes.message: A man has to live with himself, and he should see to it that he always has good company.
quotes.name: Charles Evans Hughes

quotes.message: A book is good company. It is full of conversation without loquacity. It comes to your longing with full instruction, but pursues you never.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Good company, lively conversation, and the endearments of friendship fill the mind with great pleasure.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Keep good company, and you shall be of the number.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: A man should think less of what he eats and more with whom he eats because no food is so satisfying as good company.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Good company will always be found much less expensive than bad.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: Books are good company, in sad times and happy times, for books are people-- people who have managed to stay alive by hiding between the covers of a book.
quotes.name: E. B. White

quotes.message: The shortest way to get anywhere is to have good company.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.message: In good company, the individuals merge their egotism into a social soul exactly co-extensive with the several consciousnesses there present.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Good taste is as tiring as good company.
quotes.name: Francis Picabia

quotes.message: Roads are long; make them short with a good company!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Always keep good company. Never waste an hour with anyone who doesn't lift you up and encourage you.
quotes.name: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.message: It is with a good book as it is with good company.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: In good company your thoughts run, in solitude your thought is still ... In talk your mind can be stretched, widened, exhilarated to heights, but it cannot be deepened; you have to deepen it yourself.
quotes.name: Rumer Godden

quotes.message: Good-breeding is the art of showing men, by external signs, the internal regard we have for them. It arises from good sense, improved by conversing with good company.
quotes.name: Cato the Younger

quotes.message: Children...will never go astray while they are in good company.
quotes.name: Francis M. Lyman

quotes.message: Books are always good company if you have the right sort.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott
